name: Mortar
description:
Freed from its brick prison, an indecisive spirit must arrange boxes while avoiding entrapment.

Controls: 

  • Z is undo
  • R is restart
  • WASD or arrow keys for movement 

Mobile friendly link: https://pancelor.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=d9d8698ca5519fa7d7ff0f9ad66c...
